key_points: At least 13 US soldiers were among 85 killed in explosions at Kabul airport, claimed by ISIS-K.
This incident marked the worst single-day loss for American troops in Afghanistan since August 2011.
August 26, 2021: Attack at Kabul airport kills 72 Afghans and 13 US troops.
December 21, 2015: Suicide bomber kills six American troops.
August 6, 2011: Helicopter shot down, killing 30 American troops.
May 26, 2011: Seven US troops killed by a bomb explosion.
April 19, 2011: Eight US airmen and one civilian killed by an Afghan officer.
June 28, 2005: 16 US troops killed when their helicopter is shot down.
April 6, 2005: 15 US service members and three civilians killed in a helicopter crash.
The list highlights some of the deadliest days for US troops in Afghanistan from 2002 to 2021.
